snippet: The state medical examiner’s office determined that a 15-month-old, Benjamin Seitz, of Ridgefield, had died of hyperthermia.
abstract: Death of Benjamin Seitz, 15-month-old boy who was left alone in hot car in Ridgefield, Conn, has been ruled by homicide by state medical examiner's office; state's attorney declines to comment on whether charges will be filed against boy's father, Kyle Seitz.
lead_paragraph: The state medical examiner’s office determined that a 15-month-old, Benjamin Seitz, of Ridgefield, had died of hyperthermia.

headline.main: Connecticut Boy’s Death in Hot Car Is Ruled a Homicide
headline.print_headline: Boy’s Death in Hot Car Is Classified as Homicide
